content.text:
# Miss Universe Democratic Republic of the Congo

| type                = Beauty pageant
| headquarters        = Kinshasa
| location            = Democratic Republic of the Congo
| membership          =
| language            = French
| leader_title        = Current titleholder
| leader_name         = Dorcas Dienda
| leader_title2       = National Director
| leader_name2        = Anado Kabika
| website             =
}}
Miss Universe Democratic Republic of the Congo is a national beauty pageant to select the representative of the Democratic Republic of the Congo for the Miss Universe competition.
